Metadata.Title: Latest Patches And Updates Are Installed
Metadata.DirectLink: Latest Patches And Updates Are Installed
Metadata.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan

Content.Data:
What to Check For

Check to ensure that the latest patches and updates are installed for your network firewall.

How to Fix

Subscribe to alert services provided by the manufacturer of your firewall and operating system to stay current with both security issues and service patches.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
